ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 31
ygData.msgSnippet: OK this may sound dumb, but i made my second character a wizard.  After playing a Ranger so long, I decided the wizard would be alot of fun. And it is, my
ygData.messageBody:
OK this may sound dumb, but i made my second character a wizard. After
playing a Ranger so long, I decided the wizard would be alot of fun. And it
is, my problem whoever is that i know NOTHING about research. I am 2
bubbles away from 16. Can anyone please explain to me exactly what research
is. What i need to do to be successful at it (if that makes any sense) All
i know is that I need runes. But what do i do with these runes after i get
them?? And all this talk of languages does that pertain to me? I just have
a lot of questions and ANY help from my brothers here would be great!
Thanks in advance for the help!

Kwahn
